title: Obsession
description: After nearly becoming a sacrifice, Elizabeth vows never to be the victim again. She needs power to protect herself and the ones she loves from the dark forces that pine for her abilities but this power, dark and consuming in its nature, always comes at a price.Soon Elizabeth finds herself a slave to the energy that courses through her body. Out of control and angry she must fight for control or be consumed by the power that will only crush her.
author: Megan White
